EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableTradeCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Trade, Current
AccountsPayableTradeCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccruedSalesCommissionCurrent.label: Accrued Sales Commission, Current
AccruedSalesCommissionCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for sales commissions. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedAmortizationOfOtherDeferredCo.label: Accumulated Amortization of Other Deferred Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationOfOtherDeferredCo.description: Accumulated amortization of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs, deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies, or deferred leasing costs for real estate operations.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AcquiredFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAmount.label: Acquired Finite-lived Intangible Asset, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AcquiredFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAmount.description: The aggregate amount assigned to a major class of finite-lived intangible assets acquired either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

AcquiredIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAm.label: Acquired Indefinite-lived Intangible Asset, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AcquiredIndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetAm.description: The aggregate cost of a major indefinite-lived intangible asset class acquired, during the period, either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination).

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.label: Adjustments, Noncash Items, to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Other (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.description: Transactions that do not result in cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect cash flow method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncom.label: Adjustment to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Effect from Share-based Compensation, Net
AdjustmentToAdditionalPaidInCapitalIncom.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit (deficiency) associated with an share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

AdvertisingExpense.label: Advertising Expense
AdvertisingExpense.description: Amount charged to advertising expense for the period, which are expenses incurred with the objective of increasing revenue for a specified brand, product or product line.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, after Tax
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.label: Allowance for Doubtful Other Receivables, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.description: Amount of valuation allowance for receivables classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs and Discounts
AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Incurred
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsHeldForSaleAtCarryingValue.label: Assets Held-for-sale, at Carrying Value (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleAtCarryingValue.description: Represents the sum of the carrying value of all the Assets Held-for-Sale at the balance sheet date.

AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: Current assets (normally turning over within one year or one business cycle if longer) that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold within one year.

AssetsHeldForSaleLongLived.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Long Lived (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleLongLived.description: Long-lived assets that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold in less than one year.

AssetsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Property, Plant and Equipment (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: Property, plant and equipment that is held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold in less than one year.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.label: Buildings and Improvements, Gross
BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of building structures held for productive use including addition, improvement, or renovation to the structure, including, but not limited to, interior masonry, interior flooring, electrical, and plumbing.

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityP.label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Purchase Price (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityP.description: The total cost of the acquired entity including the cash paid to shareholders of acquired entities, fair value of debt and equity securities issued to shareholders of acquired entities, the fair value of the liabilities assumed, and direct costs of the acquisition.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Assets Acquired (Liabilities Assumed), Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The total purchase price of the acquired entity. This includes cash paid to equity interest holders of the acquired entity, fair value of debt and equity securities issued to equity holders of the acquired entity, and transaction costs paid to third parties to consummate the acquisition.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Goodwill Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: Amount of goodwill arising from a business combination, which is the excess of the cost of the acquired entity over the amounts assigned to assets acquired and liabilities assumed.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Goodwill, Expected Tax Deductible Amount
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of goodwill arising from a business combination that is expected to be deductible for tax purposes.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Net Tangible Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to net tangible assets.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: This element represents the acquisition-date fair value of the total consideration transferred which consists of the sum of the acquisition-date fair values of the assets transferred by the acquirer, the liabilities incurred by the acquirer to former owners of the acquiree, and the equity interests issued by the acquirer.

BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Remeasurement Gain (Loss), Net
BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of net gain (loss) recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareGross.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Gross
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareGross.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of capitalized costs for computer software, including but not limited to, acquired and internally developed computer software.

CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedAmorti.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Accumulated Amortization
CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedAmorti.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedImpair.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Accumulated Impairment
CapitalizedContractCostAccumulatedImpair.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostAmortization.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Amortization
CapitalizedContractCostAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostImpairmentLoss.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Impairment Loss
CapitalizedContractCostImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostNet.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net
CapitalizedContractCostNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Current
CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.description: Amount of capital lease obligation due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal, through the balance sheet date and due to be paid more than one year (or one operating cycle, if longer) after the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due Thereafter
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Interest Included in Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.description: Amount necessary to reduce net minimum lease payments to present value for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Present Value of Net Minimum Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.description: Present value of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, including amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ConstructionInProgressGross.label: Construction in Progress, Gross
ConstructionInProgressGross.description: Amount of structure or a modification to a structure under construction. Includes recently completed structures or modifications to structures that have not been placed into service.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Reclassified to Receivable
ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.description: Amount of decrease in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time from transfer to receivable due to right to consideration becoming unconditional.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

CostMethodInvestments.label: Cost Method Investments
CostMethodInvestments.description: Amount, after adjustment, of cost-method investment. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, dividends received in excess of earnings after date of investment that are considered a return of investment and other than temporary impairments.

CostOfGoodsSold.label: Cost of Goods Sold (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfGoodsSold.description: Total costs related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

CostOfServices.label: Cost of Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfServices.description: Total costs related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

CostsIncurredAssetRetirementObligationIn.label: Costs Incurred, Asset Retirement Obligation Incurred
CostsIncurredAssetRetirementObligationIn.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations (ARO) costs incurred (whether capitalized or charged to expense) during the period.

CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrinciple.label: Cumulative Effect of New Accounting Principle in Period of Adoption (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
CumulativeEffectOfNewAccountingPrinciple.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets, resulting from the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Debt and Lease Obligation
DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

DecreaseInUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIsReaso.label: Decrease in Unrecognized Tax Benefits is Reasonably Possible
DecreaseInUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIsReaso.description: Amount of decrease reasonably possible in the next twelve months for the unrecognized tax benefit.

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredRevenueAndCreditsCurrent.label: Deferred Revenue and Credits, Current
DeferredRevenueAndCreditsCurrent.description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date on potential earnings that were not recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP, and which are expected to be recognized as such within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredTaxAssetsGross.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsGross.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsGrossCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsGrossCurrent.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsGrossNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsGrossNoncurrent.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, netted by jurisdiction and classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurren.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNetNoncurren.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Domestic
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible domestic operating loss carryforwards. Excludes state and local operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, State and Local
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible state and local operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsOtherTaxCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other Tax Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOtherTaxCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax carryforwards, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from compensation and benefits, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Asset Retirement Obligations
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from asset retirement obligations. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Deferred Rent
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from deferred rent.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceCurre.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceCurre.description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceNoncu.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowanceNoncu.description: Amount of valuation allowance of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards, classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.label: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Goodwill, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Intangible Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Prepaid and Other Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as prepaid and other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Property, Plant and Equipment, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DueFromAffiliateCurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Current
DueFromAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueToAffiliateCurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Current
DueToAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationMino.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationMino.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to impairment loss.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Employee Service Share-based Compensation, Nonvested Awards, Total Compensation Cost Not yet Recognized, Period for Recognition (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: The weighted average period over which unrecognized compensation is expected to be recognized for equity-based compensation plans, using a decimal to express in number of years.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Exercise of Option, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Employee Service Share-based Compensation, Tax Benefit Realized from Exercise of Stock Options (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Disclosure of the aggregate tax benefit realized from the exercise of stock options and the conversion of similar instruments during the annual period.

EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.label: Equity Method Investment, Aggregate Cost
EquityMethodInvestmentAggregateCost.description: This element represents the aggregate cost of investments accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Cost of Sales (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of the cost of sales reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment Summarized Financial Information, Equity (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of equity, including noncontrolling interest, reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Gross Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of gross profit (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities and Equity (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities and equity reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

EquitySecuritiesFvNi.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
EquitySecuritiesFvNi.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Impairment Loss, Annual Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Upward Price Adjustment, Annual Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Financing Activities
ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.description: Amount of cash inflow from realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Operating Activities
ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.description: Amount of cash outflow for realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

ExciseAndSalesTaxes.label: Excise and Sales Taxes
ExciseAndSalesTaxes.description: The amount of excise and sales taxes included in sales and revenues, which are then deducted as a cost of sales. Includes excise taxes, which are applied to specific types of transactions or items (such as gasoline or alcohol); and sales, use and value added taxes, which are applied to a broad class of revenue-producing transactions involving a wide range of goods and services.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.label: Financing Receivable, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.label: Financing Receivable, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.label: Financing Receivable, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.description: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.label: Financing Receivable, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.description: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FurnitureAndFixturesGross.label: Furniture and Fixtures, Gross
FurnitureAndFixturesGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Examples include, but are not limited to, desks, chairs, tables, and bookcases.

GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

GoodwillGross.label: Goodwill, Gross
GoodwillGross.description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillOtherChanges.label: Goodwill, Other Changes (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
GoodwillOtherChanges.description: Amount of other (increase) decrease of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.label: Goodwill, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GuarantyLiabilities.label: Guaranty Liabilities
GuarantyLiabilities.description: This item represents a non-contingent liability for the fair value of an obligation to stand ready to perform over the term of a guaranty issued in the event that specified triggering events or conditions occur.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesCurrent.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Current
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesNoncurrent.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Noncurrent
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, Accumulated Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, after Accumulated Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, before Accumulated Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Expense, Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Accrued
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The amount of estimated penalties and interest accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations, Adjustment of Deferred Tax (Asset) Liability
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCredits.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCredits.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Trade
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.description: Change in recurring obligations of a business that arise from the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services used in the production and sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all taxes owed but not paid, including income, property and other taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAssetsHeldForSale.label: Increase (Decrease) in Assets Held-for-sale
